Hey <@U07L28573J7>, I wouldn't recommend to split by a character like "a" since this can be a character in the url. I'd rather split it by a character like ","(comma). ```{% set links = contact.mediashoplink|split(",") %} {% for link in links %}

{{ link }}

{% endfor %}``` Edit: or course you'll need to check/update the property
